Uses of Interface
io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx.WebSocketFrameDecoder

  • Packages that use WebSocketFrameDecoder 
    Package Description
    io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx
    Encoder, decoder, handshakers and their related message types for Web Socket data frames.

    • Uses of WebSocketFrameDecoder in io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx

      Classes in io.netty.handler.codec.http.websocketx that implement WebSocketFrameDecoder 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  WebSocket00FrameDecoder
      Decodes ByteBufs into WebSocketFrames.
      class  WebSocket07FrameDecoder
      Decodes a web socket frame from wire protocol version 7 format.
      class  WebSocket08FrameDecoder
      Decodes a web socket frame from wire protocol version 8 format.
      class  WebSocket13FrameDecoder
      Decodes a web socket frame from wire protocol version 13 format.
